data.text: @peckham65Grant Just another overpaid bbc Boris basher, the bbc would be better off removing all the Scottish presenters on English tv
@Rabberoonies He seems disappointed we didn’t all die in the pandemic,and is desperate for a deadly variant to get excited about
@peckham65Grant Oh and I thought he was ok. Maybe I’m comparing him to some of the others I cannot stick!
@AngieCH2309 He’s been doing and gloom for over two years always negative even when things improving
@peckham65Grant I like him. He’s more factual than bias. Seems like a genuinely nice guy.
